ygData.msgSnippet: Tucson opens his channel to Windlord. Excelent Windlord, but please, do be careful.  What s most important is that both of you are kept safe from harm.  And

Tucson opens his channel to Windlord.

"Excelent Windlord, but please, do b=
e careful.  What's most important is that both of you are kept safe from ha=
rm.  And as far as my situation.. I could use a little bit of a challenge, =
but I do appreciate the gesture."

Tucson now keeps firing the missiles fro=
m his cab, in hopes to bring down a few sweeps.  The shots ring out like th=
ose fired from high powered hydraulic cannons.  He slips back from the kick=
back of his weaponry, not having used it extensively.  He learns as he goes=
 and soon plants his wheels at a pivot to keep himself stabilized.

" Hmmm.=
..  I still have some weaponry to get used to don't I?"

Rat Trap watches f=
rom above.

"Whoops, looks like Wheels is still gettn' used ta those missil=
e carriers of his.  Still though, he's not don' a bad job at usn' 'em... Bu=
t, those things gotta be a major drain on his energy reserves."

He opens h=
is channel to Tucson.

"Wheels, question for ya, how's your energy reserve =
holdn' out?"

Tucson checks An audio message is relayed to him.

" I'm at N=
inety five percent. I'm holding out Rat Trap."

Rat Trap gives an air of co=
ncern.

"I dunno how long that's gonna last Wheels, that missile carrier's =
gotta use up a lotta juice."

Tucson thinks for a moment.

"You're right, e=
ventually this is going to drain my reserves.  I can't let that happen can =
I?"

He now turns to his passengers.

"Talon, Lord Elder, I hate to do this=
 to you, but in order for me to keep up my defenses without draining my ene=
rgy reserves, I'll need to transform into robot mode.  I wouldn't want to d=
o that with any of you inside."

He opens his doors to allow his passengers=
 to safely exit his cab.
